explanation: Funds are required in Officer Pay and Allowances due to an increase in officer mobilizations over the initial projected amount due to ongoing requirements in European Command (EUCOM) Area of Responsibility (AOR). Additionally, European Deterrence Initiative (EDI) support has increased due to Ukraine support realized driving an increase in takers for family separation allowances. This is a congressional special interest item. This is an emergency budget requirement. Â© $+23.0 million for basic pay

Funds are required in SAG 1PLU Intelligence for a classified requirement and execution in the proper program. This reprogramming action does not alter congressional intent. This is a Military Intelligence Program project. This is a congressional special interest item. This is an emergency budget requirement.

Funds are available in Enlisted Pay and Allowances based on a decrease of enlisted mobilizations over the initial projected amount due to ongoing requirements in the European Command (EUCOM) Area of Responsibility (AOR). Additionally, Active Component (AC) enlisted support has decreased driving a reduction in takers for family separation allowances and special pays. This is a congressional special interest item. This is emergency budget funding.

Funds are available from within the SAG 1PL7 Maintenance program and need to be realigned to the proper program to provide assistance to Ukraine. This reprogramming action does not alter congressional intent. This is a congressional special interest item. This is emergency budget funding.

This is a congressional special interest item. This is an emergency budget requirement.
